short_summary: Wharf repairs to structure 403 at Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia
description: The work covered under this contract consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and materials to carry out marginal wharf repairs to structure 403 at Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia. The contractor must perform and complete all work by March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Wharf Repairs to Structure 403 at Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia (NS)

[Canadabuy's Document ID: 30003349](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/30003349)

---

**Notice Type: Request for Proposal**

**Procurement Category:** Construction Services

**Title:** Wharf Repairs to Structure 403 at Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia (NS)

**Description:**
This Request for Proposal is seeking a contractor to undertake construction services for the wharf repairs to Structure 403 at Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia.

**Key Project Details:**

* **Expected Contractual Completion Date:** March 31, 2023
* **Location:** Wallace, Cumberland County, Nova Scotia, Canada
* **Government Department:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **End-User Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Tender Documents:**

* Tender documents are available on Canadabuy's platform.
* The documents are listed below:
	+ GT2022-11 Wallace Wharf Repairs-Sheet 1 of 2 (English): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ GT2022-11 Wallace Wharf Repairs-Sheet 2 of 2 (English): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ 30003349 -ITT- Wharf Repairs to Structure 403 Wallace NS (English): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ C2-00532 Wallace Specification (English): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ GT2022-11 Wallace Wharf Repairs-Sheet 1 of 2 (French): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ GT2022-11 Wallace Wharf Repairs-Sheet 2 of 2 (French): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ 30003349 -ITT- Wharf Repairs to Structure 403 Wallace NS (French): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)
	+ C2-00532 Wallace Specification (French): [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/...)

**Additional Information:**

* The tender closing date is October 11
